name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Hardware Engineer with 9+ years of experience in electronics design, PCB layout, and FPGA development. Proficient in embedded systems programming with expert knowledge in **C** and **C++**, leveraging **Yocto** for system integration and optimization. Familiarity with EMC standards, AC/DC power systems, and DFM/DFT principles ensure high-quality hardware solutions. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, complemented by a commitment to collaborative project management and innovation in hardware engineering.
